AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: net maker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Nets were a highly in demand commodity on Pyandonea, and [PAWN_nameDef] took great advantage of it. [PAWN_pronoun] would always spread the many uses of nets to any potential customers, and even managed to gain the eyes of a few high ranking members of a pirate band.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: bonemold smith
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was always fascinated with the process of constructing armour from bonemold. Following their lifelong dream, [PAWN_pronoun] decided to become one of the best bonemold smiths in Vivec. Sadly, [PAWN_possessive] fledgling business was in Camonna Tong territory. [PAWN_nameDef] barely saw a sliver of gold for [PAWN_possessive] hard work, but that never stopped [PAWN_possessive] from enjoying life.
